TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionMethodItem extends System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem

summary.span: 表示智慧標籤面板項目，該項目與衍生自 之類別中的方法相關聯。

span.span: Represents a smart tag panel item that is associated with a method in a class derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表智慧標籤面板中的個別項目。The class represents individual items in a smart tag panel. 此類型的項目會顯示為作用中使用者介面項目，例如超連結，叫用從衍生類別中的程式設計人員提供方法。An item of this type is displayed as an active user interface element, such as a hyperlink, that invokes a programmer-supplied method in a class derived from . 項目與方法之間的關聯透過值維護屬性。The association between the item and the method is maintained through the value of the property. 此項目會叫用的方法必須都不採用參數或傳回值。The method that this item invokes must neither take parameters nor return a value. 個別的控制台項目相關聯一起以形成面板呼叫方法類別。Individual panel items are associated together to form a panel by a call to the method of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/CS/smarttags.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction.AddSmartTagsToWFComponent/VB/smarttags.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`includeAsDesignerVerb`參數設定為`true`，則此項目也會被視為; 因此，它就會加入至元件的設計階段的快顯功能表。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 在 Visual Studio 中，命令也會新增至**屬性**窗格的 [屬性] 視窗。In Visual Studio, a command will also be added to the **Attributes** pane of the Properties window. 設計工具動詞的清單可以透過在設計工具來存取集合屬性。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 建構函式和屬性`null`。The constructor sets the and properties to `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`includeAsDesignerVerb`參數設定為`true`，則此項目也會被視為; 因此，它就會加入至元件的設計階段的快顯功能表。If the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter is set to `true`, then this item is also considered a ; therefore, it will be added to the component's design-time shortcut menu. 設計工具動詞的清單可以透過在設計工具來存取集合屬性。A list of designer verbs can be accessed through the designer's collection property. 如需有關如何`category`參數用來在面板上的項目分組，請參閱方法。For more information about how the `category` parameter is used to group items on a panel, see the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立集合物件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a collection of objects. 實作智慧標籤的完整範例，請參閱[How to： 將附加到 Windows Form 元件的智慧標籤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233)。For a full example of implementing smart tags, see [How to: Attach Smart Tags to a Windows Forms Component](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/42cc4a0c-9ab3-47e1-93b8-03b6a6ccf233). summary.span: 以程式設計的方式執行與 相關聯的方法。

span.span: Programmatically executes the method associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性會初始化為`true`，可以也透過對應的設計工具動詞事件叫用相關聯的方法。If the property is initialized to `true`, the associated method can also be invoked through the corresponding designer verb event.

summary.span: 取得與這個 相關聯之方法的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the method that this is associated with.
A that contains the name of the associated method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定哪一個屬性，從衍生類別中類別，其應該繫結項目。The property specifies which property, in the class derived from the class, that the item should be bound to. 當程式設計人員與透過使用者介面 (UI) 的控制台項目互動時，會設定此相關聯的屬性。When the programmer interacts with the panel item through the user interface (UI), this associated property will be set. 繫結的方法應該不採用參數，也會傳回值。The bound method should neither take parameters nor return a value. 這個屬性是設定於建構函式中。This property is set in the constructor. 它會區分大小寫。It is case-sensitive.

summary.span: 取得或設定元件，該元件將其 物件提供給目前的面板。

span.span: Gets or sets a component that contributes its objects to the current panel.

value.span: 提供項目的元件，該元件應當具有提供項目的相關聯設計工具。

span.span: The contributing component, which should have an associated designer that supplies items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓另一個元件來強化其智慧標籤面板項目到目前的清單。The property allows another component to lend its smart tag panel items to the current list. 例如，使用者控制項可能會從其組成的標準控制項的其中一個彙總項目。For example, a user control might aggregate the items from one of its constituent standard controls. 這個屬性可搭配屬性。This property works in conjunction with the property.
